title: Byzantine Virgin and Child - icon characteristics

content.question: The formal qualities of the work shown identify it as an example of an

choices.label: Early Byzantine icon because of the heavily contoured figures in a shallow space
Early Byzantine icon because of the inclusion of aerial perspective
Early Christian manuscript because of the use of gold leaf and saturated colors
Early Christian manuscript because of the flattened, frontal figures

content.answer: Early Byzantine icon because of the heavily contoured figures in a shallow space

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
